title: Save Help File Images
text: Package exports single function create save {gtsummary}, {gt}, {flextable} images package help files. Install package Example {gtsummary} package saving example gt table images. saved images can inserted help files exhibit rendered tables appear. Include following chunk {roxygen2} comments insert image.
code: remotes::install_github("ddsjoberg/gt.doc.images") > gt.doc.images::save_help_file_images() #>  #> -- gtsummary (C:/Users/SjobergD/GitHub/gtsummary) ------------------------------ #>  #> -- Working on add_ci.Rd  #> √ Saving add_ci_ex1.png #>  #> -- Working on add_difference.Rd  #> √ Saving add_difference_ex1.png #> √ Saving add_difference_ex2.png #>  #> -- Working on tbl_split.Rd  #> i No saved example objects in tbl_split.Rd #' @section Example Output: #' \if{html}{Example 1} #' #' \if{html}{\figure{tbl_survfit_ex1.png}{options: width=55\%}}

title: gt.doc.images: Save Help File Images — gt.doc.images-package
Save Rd File Images — save_help_file_images
text: objects class gtsummary, gt, flextable saved. Object names must end _ex _ex[:digit:]

title: Save Rd File Images — save_help_file_images
code: save_help_file_images(   path = here::here(),   pkg = basename(path),   rd_files = NULL,   delete_existing_pngs = NULL,   run.dontrun = TRUE,   run.donttest = TRUE )

title: Save Rd File Images — save_help_file_images
text: path path package directory. Default ::() pkg Name package. Default folder name path= rd_files Character vector Rd file names search. Default Rd files. Include .Rd extension file names. delete_existing_pngs Logical indicating whether delete png files ~/man/figures/ folder. Default ask interactively rd_files = NULL. Otherwise, FALSE run.dontrun logical indicating \dontrun     ignored. run.donttest logical indicating \donttest     ignored.
